Initial Setup: Ensure you are logged into your Roblox account
Oyster Detector is designed for the Roblox game 'Sol's RNG'
Make sure you are in the game for detection to work
Navigate to the 'Webhooks' tab in Oyster Detector
In Discord: Open Server Settings (click the server name dropdown)
In Server Settings, go to 'Integrations' then 'Webhooks'
Click 'New Webhook'. Give it a name and choose a channel
Back in Oyster Detector: Click 'Add Webhook' button
Enter a descriptive name for this webhook
Paste the copied Discord webhook URL
Click 'Save'. You can add multiple webhooks
If no webhooks are configured, the detector will still function locally but no Discord notifications will be sent
Private Server Link: Paste your Sol's RNG private server link if available
This link will be included in biome and merchant notifications
In the 'Biome Detection' section, check boxes for desired biomes
GLITCHED and DREAMSPACE biomes will always send notifications
These special biomes will include an '@everyone' ping
Enable Pings: Check the 'Enable Pings' box
Provide your Discord User ID (required for pings)

How to get your Discord User ID:
1. Enable Developer Mode in Discord
2. Right-click your profile
3. Select 'Copy User ID'
User ID field MUST contain your numerical Discord ID only (e.g., 123456789012345678)
Min Rarity: Set minimum rarity for aura pings (e.g., 100000 for 1 in 100k+)
Aura Filter: Click to configure individual aura notification preferences
Day/Night: Configure different rarity thresholds for day/night auras
Set minutes to wait before reconnecting if still disconnected
Will only trigger Auto Reconnect if the timer has elapsed and you are still disconnected
Auto Reconnect will attempt to click the Start button on the main menu automatically
Eden Detection: Check box for Eden spawn alerts (experimental)
Merchant Detection: Configure separate toggles for Mari and Jester alerts
First-time merchant detection requires FastFlag setup
After enabling merchant detection, you MUST restart Roblox completely
Player join/leave events will be logged automatically if FastFlags are enabled
Ensure Sol's RNG is running (this does not apply if you have 'Join Private Server on Start' enabled)
If 'Start on launch' is enabled in Settings, detector starts automatically
Usage: Ensure Roblox is running with Sol's RNG loaded
Click 'Start Detector' or use hotkey (default F1, customizable in the Settings tab)
If provided, private server link is included in most notifications
Click 'Join PS Link' to launch Roblox directly to your private server
Access quick join from taskbar icon menu when available
Biome changes appear in 'Logs' tab immediately
Webhook notifications sent for selected biomes
Aura equips detected from rich presence (including day/night variants)
Merchants detected if enabled (separate Mari/Jester detection)
Player join/leave events logged if FastFlags enabled
Rejoins private server after specified timeout while disconnected
No additional setup required beyond configuration
Now waits for Roblox to fully close before reconnecting
Prevents inactivity kicks with periodic actions
Choose mode: Jump (spacebar), Click (mouse), or Chat ('.')
Only activates when Roblox is focused after 15 minutes
Assigning keybinds no longer triggers detector toggling
Toggle in Settings under 'Toast Notification on Event'
Troubleshooting: Ensure Roblox is open and in Sol's RNG
Verify FastFlags are properly set if using merchant/player detection
For merchants: confirm FastFlags were applied
Restart Roblox if merchant detection fails
Check day/night settings for aura detection
Test webhook URL directly with another tool
Check Biome Alert checkboxes and Aura Filter
Report issue with logs and reproduction steps
Verify private server link is valid
Now waits for full Roblox closure before reconnecting
DM @vex.rng with a screenshot of the webhook message and the rarity of the aura
Experimental feature - may not always trigger
Only supports user pings due to client-side spawning
Check logs for potential detection attempts

Configuration: Enter descriptive name for your reference
Click 'Save'. Multiple webhooks can be added
Modify name or URL as needed
Check Discord channel for test message
Invalid webhooks will now show status indicators
Troubleshooting: Verify URL is exact copy from Discord
No extra spaces or characters allowed

Viewing Logs: Timestamp shows when entry was created
WARNING: Potential issues or non-critical errors
These in-app logs are a subset of detailed log files
Log Files: Log files are timestamped by session

Example log filename:
MM-DD-YYYY hh-mm-ss oyster_detector.log
Log files are invaluable for debugging issues
Keep recent logs if experiencing problems
Understanding Log Messages:
Successfully sent to webhook [WEBHOOK_NAME]
Webhook [WEBHOOK_NAME] failed: [ERROR_DETAILS]

Loading config values...
Config saved successfully.

Starting Roblox process monitor
Detected Roblox closure

Statistics Overview: Player Activity: Join/leave events (if FastFlags enabled)
Total Biomes Detected: All biome changes
Additional statistics may be added in future updates
Stats will update/increase regardless if you have that biome/npc detection disabled

Application: UTC Offset: Set your local timezone difference
Auto-check updates: Version monitoring on startup
Run in background: Minimize to system tray
Join Private Server on Start: Auto-join configured private server link
Start on launch: Begin detection automatically
Check for missing assets: Verify required files are present
Open Logs Directory: Access detailed session logs
Open Settings Directory: View configuration files
Choose what information is included in startup message
Options include Ping settings, Private Server link, etc.
Automatic FFlag checking on launch if required features enabled
Manual check available in Settings tab
Advanced: Press Ctrl+Alt+D to toggle Developer Mode
Developer Mode features are for testing and may be unstable
Dev Tools now only available in beta versions
Troubleshooting Settings: Ensure write permissions to settings directory
For Windows startup, add to system startup programs
Account for Daylight Saving Time if applicable
Use 'Check for Missing Assets' button in Settings
